# Southpaw
## _MMA Betting Toolkit_



Southpaw is a suite of tools to provide simple interfaces to help maximize success in MMA DFS.

## Features

- Linear Lineup Generation

- Genetic Lineup Generation
- Scrapers
- ...more coming soon
